Container.Name: Sortarr
Container.Overview: Sortarr is a lightweight web dashboard for Sonarr and Radarr that helps you understand how your media library uses storage.

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Persistent app data (env file and cache).

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: Run container as this user ID (Unraid default 99).

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Run container as this group ID (Unraid default 100).

Config.Name: Tautulli metadata lookup limit
Config.Description: Optional: cap metadata lookups per load (0 disables). Leave blank for default.

Config.Name: Tautulli metadata lookup seconds
Config.Description: Optional: time limit for metadata lookups (0 disables). Leave blank for default.

Config.Name: Tautulli timeout seconds
Config.Description: Optional per-request timeout. Leave blank for default.

Config.Name: Tautulli fetch seconds
Config.Description: Optional total Tautulli fetch budget (0 disables). Leave blank for auto.
